title: Fix max supply of cake
body:
I propose to cap max supply of cake along with deflationary mechanism
1 Max supply of cake to 200 million.
2. Reduction of block reward by 25% of block reward after every 25 million cake are generated. First application on 50millionth cake mined.
author: 0x72fd5EDF417df241804Ec3c75EcB68ea6864e7be
